notes: Intel 3 is the final FinFET-based node; ~10% density gain and ~18% perf-W improvement over Intel 4
Variant optimized for 3D stacking with TSV; targets heterogeneous integration of compute and memory
Includes enhanced IO and analog interfaces; suited for chipsets and controller products
High-performance variant with 9µm TSV pitch enabling denser 3D stacking; targets AI and HPC processors
